description: Serviceberry (Amelanchier canadensis 'Glenn Form' RAINBOW PILLAR) is an amazing ornamental plant. Its leaves appear in a stunning array of colors, from golden yellow, to purplish red and even deep purple. Its white, bell-shaped flowers also offer a beautiful contrast to the foliage. Furthermore, its bright red fall fruits provide a vibrant accent to any landscape and offer a food source for birds and other wildlife animals. The Rainbow Pillar variety provides a stunning upright form, making it an ideal specimen plant for your garden. With low maintenance needs, this stunning shrub is an excellent choice for any landscape.
